item.title: Hello world, I'm back
item.description:
It’s been more than a year since my last post and I am ashamed. I created the blog with lot of enthusiasm, wrote a couple of posts and stopped. I am not happy about it.

Lot of things have happened this last year and I just couldn’t find the time to write or maintain the blog… But no more excuses, I’m back!

I’ve been updating and fixing some issues in the site and I’m ready to start writing again! I have some topic ideas, cool events in the agenda and the excitement of sharing them with the world.

Keep an eye on the site because some cheese with posts is being cooked!
